name: nik-fitness
description: Landing page for fitness coach Nik Kurdoyak

scripts.git: git add * && git commit && git push
scripts.git-amend: git add * && git commit --amend && git push --force
scripts.pipeline: npm run git && npm run deploy && npm run restart && npm run status
scripts.hotfix: npm run git-amend && npm run deploy && npm run restart && npm run status

author: Nick Kiselev
